author: Vikas Pathak
text:
The Vishwa Hindu Parishad will celebrate Ramotsav (festival of Ram) on Ram Navami, which falls in April, in one lakh villages across India, where participants will take a pledge to construct a Ram temple at Ayodhya.

“On Ram Navami, Ramotsav will be celebrated in one lakh villages across India. The day will be marked by worship of Lord Ram and taking a pledge to construct a grand temple at Ayodhya,” VHP joint general secretary Surendra Jain told The Hindu .

This decision comes in the wake of recent calls from the Sangh Parivar outfit for a Ram temple. Recent months have seen attempts to raise the temple pitch.
title: VHP to celebrate ‘Ramotsav’ in one lakh villages
